oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Form No. 18, certificate of mileage and cost for travel of John E. McGowan to the court-martial of S. R. K. Patton
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- Army -- Courts-martial and courts of inquiry; War and transportation; United States -- Army -- Office of the Judge Advocate General; Trials (Military offences) -- Tennessee, East
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Form No. 18 certifying the costs of travel and pay for Lieutenant Colonel John E. McGowan to attend the court-martial of S. R. K. Patton as ordered by Special Order No. 127. Payment totalled $40.85.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- Army -- Quartermaster's Dept.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: William Alonzo Wainwright, United States Assistant Quartermaster Records, 1861-1870
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Courts-martial convene to hear trials concerning violations of military laws, orders, or regulations.
